subject: Football (College)
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The Big Ten gave Maryland receiver Stefon Diggs a one-game suspension for his part in the scuffle, before Saturday’s game. The conference also fined Maryland $10,000.
snippet: The Big Ten gave Maryland receiver Stefon Diggs a one-game suspension for his part in the scuffle, before Saturday’s game. The conference also fined Maryland $10,000.
